thread.title: The day a Bay Area bridge was blown sky-high
thread.title_full: The day a Bay Area bridge was blown sky-high - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Bill Van Niekerken
title: The day a Bay Area bridge was blown sky-high
text:
Photo: Frederic Larson, The Chronicle On Sept. 23, 1984, explosives were used to demolish the drawbridge portion of the Dumbarton Bridge. On Sept. 23, 1984, explosives were used to demolish the drawbridge...
After decades as a traffic nightmare, this Bay Area bridge went kaboom. On Sept. 23, 1984, explosives were used to demolish the drawbridge portion of the Dumbarton Bridge. On Sept. 23, 1984, explosives were used to demolish the drawbridge...
After decades as a traffic nightmare, this Bay Area bridge went kaboom.
